name: Swechha We For Change Foundation
briefDescription: Swechha is an organization dedicated to enabling ourselves and others around us to ‘Be the Change’, in making a visible difference to the Environment- both Physical and Social. Our mission is to inspire, create and support - a just, equitable and sustainable society, for everyone and forever.In the numerous things we do at Swechha, there are three key Focus Areas we address: (i) Environment and Citizenship; (ii) Education and Governance; and (iii) Empowerment and Enterprises.
